name: Geostationary Communication
description: Deploy a communication satellite in a geostationary orbit to provide continuous coverage for telecommunications.

name: Polar Earth Observation
description: Launch a satellite into a polar orbit to capture comprehensive images of the Earth's surface for environmental monitoring.

name: Molniya High-Latitude Coverage
description: Place a satellite in a Molniya orbit to ensure extended coverage over high-latitude regions for communication and navigation.

name: Sun-Synchronous Earth Science
description: Deploy a satellite in a Sun-Synchronous Orbit (SSO) to capture consistent images of the Earth's surface for scientific research.
